column9: definitley worth a try if you suffer from migrane headaches. I have severe migranes when i have them this medicine really did the trick for me.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I swear by this. It works fantasic for cramps and never once had a side effect from it. I have taken some strong meds to help but this seems the best to work fast and get rid of those nasty cramps!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Every person is different and I am sure Advil Migraine will work differently for every person.  I personally love it.  I rarely get migraines but when I do, they are severe enough to give me blind spots.  Within about 20-30 minutes of taking 2 pills, the blind spots disappear and the migraine is gone.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Took this as a suggestion from a family member for my migraines, the next day I had blisters and sores all over my body, most of the sores lasted for weeks after stopping the medication.  I would never take this again nor would I suggest it to anyone.

column2: turtle, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have had migraines for over 25 yrs., so I really had my doubts about an over-the-counter medicine. I was surprised when I took 4 Advil Migraine over a 24 hr. period, and they worked! They took care of the nausea and the pain! I was looking for something that didn't cost as much as my regular migraine medicine and I found it! Thank you Advil!

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I am an avid user of Advil Migraine. Sometimes I use it up to 3-4 times a week, other times not at all. Everytime I get a migraine this seems to work for me. I've tried regular aspirins and they work the first couple times and then nothing. This has always worked. I take one and lay down for 30 mins or so and wake up feeling much better. I only take one too, I don't take the recommended dose and it's great!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month
column9: I took 2 of these Advil Migraine Liquids about 30 minutes ago, I nearly went to 24 hour emergency care before realising that I'm experiencing most of the SEVERE side effects, these pills are terrible, don't buy them, and throw them away if they're in you're cabinet!

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: Years of painful menstrual cramping and prescription drugs to treat and one day I accidentally pick up this form of ibuprofen (free acid form-Advil migraine).  It works unbelievably well on menstrual cramping.  Not sure why Wyeth recommends not exceeding 2 pills/day for this form.  Stomach upset is really bad, even with milk.  It is difficult to take but controls pain within 10 minutes...not kidding!  It controls severe pain so give it a try.

column9: Medically this product has worked for me - release of pain - I have experienced blood in my bowels that I have traced back to everytime I take this product - when I stop taking it - I do not experience the blood in bowel.
